title: In AI-simulated Fed meeting, political pressure polarises board
description: A simulated Federal Reserve meeting that used artificial intelligence agents modeled on real-life policymakers showed political pressure polarised members of the board in their rate-setting deliberations.
content:
TOKYO, Sept 11 (Reuters) - A simulated Federal Reserve meeting that used artificial intelligence agents modeled on real-life policymakers showed political pressure polarised members of the board in their rate-setting deliberations.

title: AI rollout in NHS hospitals faces major challenges
description: Implementing artificial intelligence (AI) into NHS hospitals is far harder than initially anticipated, with complications around governance, contracts, data collection, harmonisation with old IT systems, finding the right AI tools and staff training, finds a major new UK study led by UCL researchers.

title: Alibaba to raise $3.2 billion via convertible bond to fund cloud growth
description: Alibaba, among China's most aggressive adopters of artificial intelligence, said it would use nearly 80% of the proceeds to expand data centres, upgrade technology and improve services to meet rising demand for cloud computing solutions.
content:

title: Novel method accurately identifies therapeutic antibodies to treat infectious diseases
description: Scientists at Scripps Research have developed a novel method that uses artificial intelligence (AI) and advanced imaging techniques to more accurately and efficiently identify therapeutic antibodies to treat infectious diseases.
content:

title: Oracle share price jumps 36%, posts biggest one-day gain since 1992, adds $244 billion in market value
description: Oracle's share price surged 36%, reaching $328.33, its largest single-day gain since 1992. The market capitalization rose to $922 billion, outperforming Eli Lilly, JPMorgan Chase, and Walmart, driven by optimism for its cloud business and artificial intelligence demand.
content: Oracle share price surged 36% after the company projected strong revenue growth in the coming years. The shares jumped 35.95% to $328.33 per share, marking its biggest single-day gain since 1992. With this rally, Oracle’s market capitalisation rose t... [318 chars]

title: Oracle's Ellison Challenges Musk's 'Richest Person' Title
description: Billionaire Elon Musk could lose his title as the world's wealthiest person to Oracle co-founder Larry Ellison, whose software giant appears poised for massive riches from artificial intelligence through a major deal with OpenAI.

title: FTC Probes OpenAI, Meta, xAI Over AI Chatbot Safety For Kids
description: Regulators warned artificial intelligence can “effectively mimic” human characteristics, prompting younger users to “trust and form relationships” with chatbots.
content:
